data.text: @NewsBFM @DGHisham So after quarantine the patient is unlikely to spread the virus?

@NewsBFM Is it true that Donald Trump is totally responsible for the Covid deaths of most Americans because he did NOT act and called it sHOAX? America is 5% of total global population and 17% of all DEATHS!
@PuteraAyahbonda @NewsBFM kuratin je sejak ada double line tu 7 hari..x perlu uji dh..positif x semestinya jn ada simptom..mcm biasa pcr lbh tepat

@xxyuex @NewsBFM according to some research, after incubation period end, usually the CT value would increase which means the viral less likely to infect other people. my company sop mention unless their test show negative, only then they can start working from office. even after quarantine end.
@kbasyar85 @NewsBFM jadi berapa hari patut saya kuarantin sedangkan saya takde simpton..& hari ke berapa patut saya buat test pulak?

@CK_theWasteguy @NewsBFM @KKMPutrajaya Betul, CAC tak buat PCR test but the staff should know how to interpret the result and to advise appropriate measures according to the latest KKM guidelines to the patients.
@PuteraAyahbonda @NewsBFM Start quaratine dr yg samar2 tu, prepre for the worse. If nknlbh conform. Buat pcr.

@CK_theWasteguy @NewsBFM @KKMPutrajaya Actually people do cares about their CT value. Thats the reason why some people will go for PCR after their quarantine over. If u detected positive again after 90 days. U will considered reinfection and u will need to go another quarantine

@NewsBFM nak tanya...hari jumaat 4 hari lepas saya demam.pagi sabtu buat test result positif.naik samar2.tapi saya takde simptom apa apa.demam pon dah takde lagi.pagi semalam test,https://t.co/87EURTHBgN,hari ke berapa patut saya buat test lagi utk tentukan saya betul betul ok?
